overview:
Martin is an entrepreneurial minded individual in the early stages of his career with a passion for startups and innovative thinkings. His creative approach has seeing him involve himself with various individuals helping them successfully launch their startup and market it with success.

He is the Founder of various projects which you can see here With the most notable being Entredex , the leading online database, boosting 1000+ Entrepreneur members . Entredex, aims to provide a platform for other entrepreneurs to meet and network with other like minded individuals in their field of expertise.
